Statement: BWB Q100 load envelope meets all design conditions including hydrogen fuel system integration
Structural loads analysis complete for all flight phases and ground operations
Strength analysis demonstrates adequate margins for all structural elements
High speed stability and control demonstrated through CFD and flight test
Emergency landing conditions meet crashworthiness requirements for BWB configuration
Damage tolerance and fatigue evaluation program established
Materials meet specification and traceability requirements
Compartment interiors meet flammability test requirements
Hydrogen fuel system meets safety requirements under special conditions
Hydrogen leak detection and ventilation adequate
System function and installation meet requirements
Equipment systems meet safety assessment requirements
FHA PSSA SSA completed with appropriate DAL allocations
Cockpit arrangement and visibility meet requirements
Ice protection system adequate for all conditions
External noise levels meet certification requirements
